name: Seven Doorways
summary:
Inspired by the idea of daily exploration, Seven Doorways presents you with a different environment depending on which day of the week it is when you run it.

It's an exercise in slowing down and not worrying about goals or mechanics. There's nothing to do but hang out for a little while and enjoy your surroundings. Feel no pressure to stay, leave when you want and visit again another day for a new experience.
